feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-10-06T21:52:33.869329Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;为什么摩托罗拉 68000 处理器系列不再在 PC 中使用？</stitle>; <id>;https://retrocomputing.stackexchange.com/questions/27722/why-did- the-motorola-68000-processor-family-fall-out-of-use-in-personal-computer</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T20:55:05.903807Z</更新>; <link href="https ://retrocomputing.stackexchange.com/questions/27722/why-did-the-motorola-68000-processor-family-fall-out-of-use-in-personal-computer"/>; <作者>; <名称>;SeenNotHeard </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SeenNotHeard</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.sstatic .net/Img/teams/teams-illo-free-sidebar-promo.svg?v=47faa659a05e" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;由于多种原因，摩托罗拉 68000 处理器系列不再在 PC 中使用。其中一个原因是成本高、体积小，这使得摩托罗拉很难继续提高处理器的速度。此外随着 PowerPC、ARM 和 MIPS 等 RISC CPU 的兴起，提供了更简单、更便宜的替代方案。x86 架构在 PC 中的成功也归功于整个 PC 机，包括 BIOS 和外围硬件。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-did-the-motorola-68000-processor-family-fall-out-of-use-in-pcs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37796292" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AMD 可能会跨越 CUDA 护城河</stitle>; <id>;https://www.hpcwire.com/2023/10/ 05/how-amd-may-get-across-the-cuda-moat/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T17:50:05.907183Z</更新>; <link href="https://www. hpcwire.com/2023/10/05/how-amd-may-get-across-the-cuda-moat/"/>; <author>; <name>;danzheng</​​name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=danzheng</​​uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.hpcwire.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/AMD -MI300A-675x343.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 112px;" />;<br />;在讨论 GenAI 时，“GPU”这个词几乎总是出现在对话中，并且话题常常转向性能和访问。有趣的是，“GPU”这个词被认为是指“Nvidia”产品. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amd-may-get-across-the-cuda-moat" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37793635" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;让困难变得容易</stitle>; <id>;https://jvns.ca/blog/2023/10/06/new-talk--making- Hard-things-easy/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T14:50:05.907703Z</更新>; <link href="https://jvns.ca/blog/2023/10/06/new- talk--making-hard-things-easy/"/>; <author>; <name>;hasheddan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hasheddan</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://jvns.ca/images/strangeloop-2023-talk/slide-0.png" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了作者在 Strange Loop 上题为“让困难的事情变得容易”的主题演讲。作者分享了他们在学习复杂主题时的挫败感，并提供了如何使这些主题变得更容易的想法。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#making-hard-things-easy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=37791002" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;研究人员测试了人工智能水印并全部破解</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wired.com/story/artificial-intelligence-watermarking-issues/</id>; <updated>; 2023-10-06T19:50:05.908785Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story/artificial-intelligence-watermarking-issues/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;adg29< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adg29</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired. com/photos/651b4a6acbda6166a8b6155f/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/AI_W_DUD3.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;给人工智能图像加水印目前不可靠且容易被破解。不可见和可见的水印都可以被操纵和删除。虽然有些人认为水印在人工智能检测中占有一席之地，但另一些人则认为它并不有效并且很容易被伪造或忽略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#researchers-tested-ai-watermarks-and-broke-all-of-them" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37767633" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fail2Ban – 用于禁止导致多个身份验证错误的主机的守护进程</stitle>; <id>;https://github .com/fail2ban/fail2ban</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T19:50:05.909394Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/fail2ban/fail2ban"/>; <作者>; <名称>;redbell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=redbell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// camo.githubusercontent.com/270c686a79697f1292054865b13732166001452000e7a02fc69081963a9c2166/687474703a2f2f7777772e776f726c64697076366c61756e 63682e6f72672f77702d636f6e74656e742f7468656d65732f697076362f646f776e6c6f6164732f576f726c645f495076365f6c61756e63685f6c6f676 f2e737667" style="宽度：220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Fail2Ban 扫描日志文件并禁止 IP 地址进行过多的失败登录尝试。它降低了错误的身份验证尝试率，但无法消除弱身份验证带来的风险。 <a href="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/#fail2ban-daemon-to-ban-hosts-that-c​​ause-multiple-authentication-errors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37795100" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Java 21 VirtualThreads 与 Clojure Lazy Seqs</stitle>; <id>;https://clojure.org/news/2023/10/06/deref</id >; <更新>;2023-10-06T15:50:05.910028Z</更新>; <link href="https://clojure.org/news/2023/10/06/deref"/>; <作者>; <名称>;grzm </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=grzm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Java 21 VirtualThreads 激发了人们对 Clojure 生态系统的兴趣和实验然而，虚拟线程不与对象监视器配合，导致 Clojure 中出现惰性 seq 和延迟问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#java-21-virtualthreads-vs-clojure-lazy-seqs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37792294" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人文数据的探索性数据分析</stitle>; <id>;https://awk.dev/eda.html</id>; <updated>;2023-10- 06T16：50：05.910593Z </更新>; <link href =“https://awk.dev/eda.html”/>; <作者>; <名称>;yarapavan </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=yarapavan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;2023 年春天，向一群学生教授了一门名为“文学即数据”的课程。该课程旨在将文学研究与计算机结合起来，教学生如何使用计算机探索数据集。本课程使用 Unix 命令行工具和 Awk 进行数据探索的初始阶段。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#exploratory-data-analysis-for- humanities-data" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37792916" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们如何管理 200 个开源存储库</stitle>; <id>;https://turbot.com/blog/2023/10/repo-management</id>; <已更新>;2023-10-06T20:50:05.911199Z</已更新>; <link href="https://turbot.com/blog/2023/10/repo-management"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nathanwallace</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nathanwallace</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://turbot.com/images /blog/2023-10-repo-management/open-plugin-mod-pr-age.png" style="width: 220px; height: 107px;" />;<br />;我们运行一个主要的开源项目 Steampipe，该项目催生了 200 多个开源存储库。管理所有这些存储库需要技术严谨性和人际关系。大菱鲆结合了经过验证的工程实践和对社区的关注。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-we-manage-200-open-source-repos" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37789617" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;工作流模式</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.bittacklr.be/the-workflow-pattern.html</id>; <更新>;2023 -10-06T18:50:05.911856Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.bittacklr.be/the-workflow-pattern.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kiyanwang</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kiyanwang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.bittacklr.be/the-工作流程模式/persisted_workflow_stream.png" style="width: 220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;我已经开始尝试事件源工作流，从其他产品和项目中汲取灵感。工作流可以建模为状态机或状态图，并用于自动化无法在单个事务中完成的流程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-workflow-pattern" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=37776079" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;显示 HN：使用旧平板电脑作为额外显示器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/alex028502/extra-screen</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T11 :50:05.912479Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/alex028502/extra-screen"/>; <作者>; <name>;alex028502</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=alex028502</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/alex028502/extra-screen/master/pics/图片.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了通过 SSH 将旧平板电脑连接到计算机，将其用作额外的屏幕。作者分享了他们的经验并强调了这种方法的问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-use-an-old-tablet-as-an-extra-monitor" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37789371" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Open-ribbon – 对 PS1 音乐游戏 Vib-Ribbon 进行逆向工程的项目</stitle>; <id>;https://github。 com/open-ribbon/open-ribbon</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T16:50:05.913144Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/open-ribbon/open-ribbon "/>; <author>; <name>;millerhooks</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=millerhooks</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://opengraph.githubassets.com/75d8ff97d2346b7d69788ce4db6bf9638d73f2a93f934dc818582706bb1ad533/open-ribbon/open-ribbon”样式=“宽度：220px；高度：110px；” />;<br />;PS1 游戏 Vib-Ribbon (ビブribon) 的 PAL 版本的 WIP 反编译。目标是制作该游戏的免费开源逆向工程版本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#open-ribbon-a-project-to-reverse-engineer-the-ps1-music-game-vib-ribbon" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37792996" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：使用 Deno 的简单 Pastebin 克隆</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com /JLCarveth/nutty</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T19:50:05.913781Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/JLCarveth/nutty"/>; <作者>; <名称>; JLCarveth</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JLCarveth</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph. githubassets.com/f2db35142ab742471f49086460504b87f40486fc4d23b0d5aaac527fc350f5de/JLCarveth/nutty" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Nutty 是一个自托管粘贴服务器，可让您轻松上传和即时共享文本文件。它需要在您的系统上安装 Deno。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-a-simple-pastebin-clone-using-deno" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37794960" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Neobrutalism 组件 – React-tailwind 组件集合</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ekmas/neobrutalism-components </id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T19:50:05.914329Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/ekmas/neobrutalism-components"/>; <作者>; <名称>;samke- </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samke-</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw. githubusercontent.com/ekmas/neobrutalism-components/main/public/logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Neobrutalism 组件是用 React 和 Tailwind 编写的类型安全组件的集合。我为那些想要更多地了解新野蛮主义的人们创建了这个组件集合。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-neobrutalism-components-a-collection-of-react-tailwind-components" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37794904" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Jimbo 的 Petscii 横向滚动平台游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://jimbo.itch.io/petscii-side-scrolling -platformer</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T15:50:05.915387Z</更新>; <link href="https://jimbo.itch.io/petscii-side-scrolling-platformer"/>; <作者>; <name>;reaperducer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=reaperducer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //img.itch.zone/aW1hZ2UvMjI4OTQ5OS8xMzU2NjkyMS5wbmc=/347x500/%2BBScX%2B.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Commodore PET 现在有一个多层次的横向卷轴平台游戏。受到《马里奥》和《索尼克》等其他横向卷轴平台游戏的启发。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#petscii-side-scrolling-platformer-by-jimbo" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37792129" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Shortbread – 在几分钟内创建 AI 漫画</stitle>; <id>;https://shortbread.ai/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T16 :50:05.915951Z</updated>; <link href="https://shortbread.ai/"/>; <作者>; <name>;凤娇</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=凤娇</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://framerusercontent.com/images/jgEf4CVfD3HCUsKieblN5u7B8.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 220px; ” />;<br />;从火花开始——无论是故事情节、独特的角色，还是您想要捕捉的特定情绪。只需描述它，然后让 Shortbread 将您的想法转化为页面，为您的艺术才华奠定基础。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-shortbread-create-ai-comics-in-minutes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37792444" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;旧 iPhone 何时会变得无法安全使用？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.intego.com/mac-security-blog/ when-does-an-old-iphone-become-unsafe-to-use/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T14:50:05.916529Z</更新>; <link href="https://www. intego.com/mac-security-blog/when-does-an-old-iphone-become-unsafe-to-use/"/>; <author>; <name>;akyuu</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=akyuu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-does-an-old- iphone-become-unsafe-to-use" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37788747" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;23andMe 抓取事件泄露数据130 万用户</stitle>; <id>;https://therecord.media/scraping-incident-genic-testing-site</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T20:50:05.917228Z</更新>; < link href="https://therecord.media/scraping-incident-genic-testing-site"/>; <author>; <name>;doener</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=doener</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cms.therecord.media/uploads/DSC_0283_1_a6f4e4e315.jpg?w=3840" style="width: 220px ; height: 232px;" />;<br />;基因检测公司23andMe遭遇数据抓取事件，黑客获取敏感用户信息并在暗网上出售。近700万用户的信息，包括起源估计、表型、健康信息、照片和身份数据被出售。该公司最初否认这些信息的合法性，但后来承认发生了未经授权访问个人账户的情况。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #23andme-scraping-incident-leaked-data-on-1-3m-users" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =37795652" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;SudoLang：一种旨在与 AI 语言模型协作的编程语言</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/paralleldrive/sudolang-llm-support</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T14 :50:05.917823Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/paralleldrive/sudolang-llm-support"/>; <作者>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/358774a7222f298e4bf099a26a4b1ebca483459977890a906083197963b7176d/687474703a2 f2f696d672e796f75747562652e636f6d2f76692f326a71504a7350756639452f302e6a7067"样式="宽度：220像素； height: 165px;" />;<br />;SudoLang是一种旨在与AI语言模型协作的编程语言。它易学易用，表达力强大，只需几行代码就可以定义复杂的行为自然语言文本。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sudolang-a-programming-language-Design-to-collaborate-with-ai-language-models" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37791060" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;当分配器囤积你宝贵的内存时</stitle>; <id>;https://www.algolia.com /blog/engineering/when-allocators-are-hoarding-your-precious-memory/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T15:50:05.918458Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .algolia.com/blog/engineering/when-allocators-are-hoarding-your-precious-memory/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;marcodiego</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=marcodiego</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/hilnmyskv/image/upload/q_auto,f_auto/v1696493630/Algolia_com_Blog_assets/ Featured_images/ecommerce/what-is-conversational-commerce-and-what-are-its-潜在影响-on-the-ecommerce-industry/vaex353c2yujmg9j80q4.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;在生产环境中升级操作系统可能会产生意想不到的后果，例如内存消耗增加。本文讨论了升级操作系统对内存分配的影响，并探讨了潜在的解决方案。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-allocators-are-hoarding-your-precious-memory” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37791897" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;南极洲上空的臭氧空洞已扩大到巴西大小的三倍</stitle>; <id>;https://www.space.com/ozone-hole-antarctica-third- times-size-of-brazil</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T18:50:05.919739Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.space.com/ozone-hole-antarctica- Three -times-size-of-brazil"/>; <作者>; <名称>;saikatsg </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=saikatsg</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FHSnfv6hdmdcFgnBrwuzHE-320-80.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;南极洲上空的臭氧空洞已扩大到巴西大小的三倍。欧洲航天局 (ESA) 哥白尼 Sentinel-5P 卫星的观测表明，臭氧空洞达到约 1000 万平方英里2023 年 9 月 16 日，面积达 2600 万平方公里，成为有史以来观察到的最大的季节性空洞之一。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ozone-hole-above-南极洲已增长到巴西大小的三倍" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=37793941" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;胶片罐中的 ​​20MP 传感器重振老式模拟相机</stitle>; <id>;https://petapixel.com/2023/10/06/a-20mp-sensor-in-a-film-canister -reinvigorates-vintage-analog-cameras/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T19:50:05.920315Z</更新>; <link href="https://petapixel.com/2023/10/06/a -20mp-sensor-in-a-film-canister-reinvigorates-vintage-analog-cameras/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mikece</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=mikece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://petapixel.com/assets/uploads/2023/10/Screenshot-2023-10-06-at- 13.45.56-800x420.jpg" style="宽度: 220px;高度：116px;" />;<br />;I'm Back Film 是一款数字胶卷，可让老式模拟相机起死回生。它采用 20 兆像素索尼微型三分之四图像传感器，为未使用的模拟相机提供第二次机会<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-20mp-sensor-in-a-film-canister-reinvigorates-vintage-analog-cameras" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37795278" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;欧盟抓住 ARM 打造第一台 ExaFLOP 超级计算机</stitle>; <id>;https://www.hpcwire.com/2023 /10/04/eu-grabs-arm-for-first-exaflop-supercomputer-x86-misses-out/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T14:50:05.920953Z</更新>; <link href= “https://www.hpcwire.com/2023/10/04/eu-grabs-arm-for-first-exaflop-supercomputer-x86-misses-out/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;timthorn</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=timthorn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.hpcwire.com/ wp-content/uploads/2023/10/JSC-JUPITER-Pressemtteilung-Final-1-675x380.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;欧洲第一台百亿亿次超级计算机Jupiter的配置已经敲定，这对Nvidia来说是一场胜利，但对x86芯片厂商Intel和AMD来说却是失望。耗资 2.73 亿欧元建造，将把基于 ARM 架构的 SiPearl 的 Rhea 处理器与 Nvidia 的加速器技术结合起来。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eu-grabs-arm-for-first -exaflop-supercomputer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37791116" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;哈勃的希区柯克时刻：意外地点的爆炸< /stitle>; <id>;https://scitechdaily.com/hubbles-hitchcock-moment-a-bizarre-explosion-in-unexpected-place/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T15:50:05.921505Z< /updated>; <link href="https://scitechdaily.com/hubbles-hitchcock-moment-a-bizarre-explosion-in-unexpected-place/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</名称>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scitechdaily.com/images/Luminous-Fast -Blue-Optical-Transient-scaled.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：170px;" />;<br />;一种罕见的宇宙事件，称为发光快蓝光瞬变 (LFBOT)，已被发现。这些事件是强烈的蓝光爆发，快速演化，达到峰值亮度并在物质中褪色哈勃太空望远镜最近观测到位于两个相邻星系之间的 LFBOT，这是出人意料的，因为 LFBOT 通常出现在星系的旋臂中。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hubbles- hitchcock-moment-an-explosion-in-unexpected-place" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37792322" target= "_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;VeroRoute – 开源 Veroboard、Perfboard 和 PCB 布局设计软件</stitle>; <id>;https://sourceforge.net/projects/veroroute/</id>; <updated>;2023-10-06T15:50:05.922072Z</已更新>; <link href="https://sourceforge.net/projects/veroroute/"/>; <作者>; <name>;app4soft</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= app4soft</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/proj/veroroute/screenshots/demo_vero226.png/245/183/ 1" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;免费下载 VeroRoute。基于 Qt 的 Veroboard、Perfboard 和 PCB 布局和布线应用程序。用于生产 Veroboard（带状板）、Perfboard 和 1 层或 2 层的跨平台软件PCB 布局。自动防止短路并检查开路。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#veroroute-an-open-source-veroboard-perfboard-and-pcb-layout-design -software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37787569" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2023/24 Redox 操作系统开发优先事项</stitle>; <id>;https://www.redox-os.org/news/development-priorities-2023-09/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T20:50:05.922607Z</更新>; <link href= “https://www.redox-os.org/news/development-priorities-2023-09/”/>; <author>; <name>;akyuu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=akyuu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.redox-os.org/img/icon.png" style="width: 220px ; height: 220px;" />;<br />;2023/24 Redox 开发重点包括建立稳定的 ABI、开发服务器版本、自托管构建系统、移植开发人员工具、提高性能和响应能力以及启用 Cosmic Desktop环境。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#redox-os-development-priorities-for-2023-24" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37795751" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;总线嗅探 IBM 5150</stitle>; <id>;https://martypc.blogspot.com/2023/10/bus-sniffing-ibm-5150 .html</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T11:50:05.923243Z</更新>; <link href="https://martypc.blogspot.com/2023/10/bus-sniffing-ibm-5150. html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ingve</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEhmC7ezDm3UwvdM7sAH285PwS9xPvh198O2ojXdvYquHxMELzETSa46bKFv6jg7EyxWyXCuO6dru6TUI2xfmlEXMsUXMkznvcnyE 8qYm1iniFXPOlwnW64GoYQYur2cH0nJf0--MpRYqnsQp3Ghi756tgbcPq5Sa5fzSep0uaERLPmIgFMT_zxH2-7HBLKy/w640-h394/area_good.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 136px;" />;<br />;IBM 5150 总线嗅探涉及使用数字逻辑分析仪来捕获 CPU 周期轨迹并解码总线信号。该过程需要修改 Pi8088 PCB 并使用带将其连接到逻辑分析仪电缆和探头线。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bus-sniffing-the-ibm-5150" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37789106" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们正在开放 Gov.uk 表格的访问</stitle>; <id>;https://gds.blog.gov.uk/2023/10/ 03/how-were-opening-up-access-to-gov-uk-forms/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-06T11:50:05.923808Z</更新>; <link href="https:// gds.blog.gov.uk/2023/10/03/how-were-opening-up-access-to-gov-uk-forms/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;open-source-ux</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=open-source-ux</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gds.blog .gov.uk/wp-content/uploads/sites/60/2023/10/image1-620x413.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;GOV.UK Forms 是一个在线表单生成器，允许政府部门创建可访问且用户友好的数字表单。它目前处于内测阶段，将开放以供更广泛的访问未来。表单生成器包括路由、不可编辑的实时表单、详细指导和用户身份验证等功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#were-opening-up-access-to-gov- uk-forms" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37789107" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</内容>; </条目>; </提要>;
